description: Review markdown files in context/ and archive completed ones
session_startup: Run git status to check branch
Read this file to find current task
Find first task where status=pending and blocked_by=null

tasks.name: Review evaluation-checklist.md

steps: Read context/evaluation-checklist.md
Check if related plans exist in completed/
Determine if this is still active reference or completed work
If complete: git mv to context/completed/
If active: document why it should stay

tasks.name: Review session-notes.md
tasks.decision: ARCHIVED - all items converted to plan JSONs now in completed/
steps: Read context/session-notes.md
Determine if these are historical notes or active guidance
If historical/stale: git mv to context/completed/
If active: document why it should stay
acceptance_criteria: File moved to completed/ OR noted as active reference

tasks.name: Review source-declared-merge-design.md
steps: Read context/source-declared-merge-design.md

If implementation is complete and design is historical: git mv to context/completed/

tasks.name: Review traceability-map.md

steps: Read context/traceability-map.md
Note: CLAUDE.md lists this as a key context file
Verify if mappings are still accurate

If accurate: note as active reference, keep in place

tasks.name: Commit all cleanup changes
steps: git status to see all changes
Stage moved files
Commit with message: chore(context): archive completed markdown files
Push to branch
